org.joo.steak.impl

Class AbstractState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joo.steak.impl.event.AbstractStateChangedDispatcher
      • org.joo.steak.impl.AbstractState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateChangedDispatcher, State

    public abstract class AbstractState
extends AbstractStateChangedDispatcher
implements State
    An abstract implementation of State. It includes the changeState method as a more convenient way than the usual fireStateChangedEvent.
    Author:
    griever
